verbs.description: winterize (third-person singular simple present winterizes, present participle winterizing, simple past and past participle winterized)

examples: Temperatures are expected to plummet over the weekend, and aside from grabbing a coat, experts say there’s some things you should do to winterize your home.

entries.meaning: (transitive) To remove the saturated fats from (a vegetable oil) by cooling and filtering it, so that it does not go cloudy in the winter.
examples: Some oils which are frequently winterized to produce salad oil are: refined and lightly hydrogenated soybean oil, cottonseed oil and some varieties of rapeseed oil.
The continuous miscella winterizing process takes from 45 min to 1 hr to produce +15 hr cold test oil.
